titles.title: CB 39 Your Steadfast Love Extends to the Heavens

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
YOUR STEADFAST LOVE EXTENDS TO THE
HEAVENS,
Your faithfulness reaches to the skies, Your
righteousness is like majestic mountains, and
Your wisdom like the depths of the sea, and You
come to me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Filling my heart is Your lovingkindness. I find my
peace in the shadow of Your wings. I eat my fill of
the abundance of Your household, and I drink
from the streams of rejoicing. You are my King.
